definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of blood glucose test in neonatal hyperbilirubinemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究新生儿高胆红素血对血葡萄糖测定的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the determination of bilirubin in Xihuang capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立西黄胶囊中胆红素含量的测定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the interference of rifampicin on the determination of serum bilirubin .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨利福平对血清胆红素测定的干扰。

sentences.english: It is caused by a build-up of the chemical bilirubin in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 这是造成中积累了化学胆红素在血液中。

sentences.english: How should total bilirubin do high slightly?
sentences.chinese: 总胆红素略高该怎么办？

sentences.english: Some tests, such as albumin and bilirubin , do.
sentences.chinese: 一些测试，如白蛋白和胆红素，这样做。

sentences.english: The literature study deals with the epidemiology of cholelithiasis.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了胆红素结石成石的现代研究机理。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between the serum bilirubin and uric acid levels with coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血清胆红素和尿酸水平与冠心病的关系。

sentences.english: Objective It is to approach the influence of hyperbilirubinemia on blood clotting function in premature infant.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨高胆红素血症对早产儿凝血功能的影响。

sentences.english: Bilirubin deposits were only found in brains of T2G.
sentences.chinese: 光镜下脑片仅T2G可见散在胆红素颗粒沉积。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of human milk on intestinal absorption of bilirubin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索母乳对胆红素经肠肝循环回吸收的影响。

sentences.english: What exactly is the cause of elevated bilirubin in the body can cause it?
sentences.chinese: 究竟是哪些原因可引起体内胆红素升高呢？

sentences.english: Now that bilirubinuria is present, the urine darkens .
sentences.chinese: 由于胆红素尿的存在，小便颜色有所加深。

sentences.english: In such oxidation case, bilirubin could be oxidized into biliverdin by oxygen in alkaline solution.
sentences.chinese: 表明胆红素在碱性环境中可被氧化成胆绿素。

sentences.english: Determination of bilirubin in xihuang soft capsule by VIS;
sentences.chinese: 目的建立西黄胶囊中胆红素含量的测定方法。

definition: choline esterase (ChE), hydrolyzing enzyme in blood plasma
